title: Preventing children from going outside after Maghrib | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: here in my country parents forbid their children from going outside after Maghrib to protect them from Shaitaan is it true or just a myth no this is true the Prophet prohibited us and it's awesome from sending our children alone unattended and accompanied by an adult between Mallory monisha and he said that this is the time where Devils spread their most and they might hijack or harm the children but if they're attended by an adult if they are with their parents there's nothing wrong in that ish Allah
